description: France will create a new reserve around the mountain amid concerns over tourism and pollution.
title: France's Macron vows to protect Mont Blanc from overcrowding
title_page: France's Macron vows to protect Mont Blanc from overcrowding - BBC News
maintext: "Mr President, taking care of the forests in the Amazon is very good. Ignoring what is happening on Mont-Blanc and letting disrespect continue is not tolerable," the letter written by the mayor of Saint-Gervais said.
